design_rationale.primary: Lag1 is the strongest predictor (naive baseline MAE=18.3)
design_rationale.secondary: Lag7 captures weekly seasonality (same day last week)
design_rationale.tertiary: EWMA7 as smoothed trend, but lower weight than before
design_rationale.exclusions: Reduced feature count to prevent overfitting

note: v3.0.94 RFE was based on data-leakage metrics. This version prioritizes Lag features.

excluded_features.reason: Overfitting risk / redundant with Lag features
excluded_features.analysis: Simpler model with fewer features should generalize better

expected_improvement: Lag1 as primary feature should beat naive baseline (MASE < 1)
